From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Razor Claw sat up straight as Ice adressed him. "You have been placed as my
commanding officer, your rank alone influences me to trust you with my
spark." He was flattered that she'd allow him to adress her by her name but
under the circumstances he found protocall easier to follow. His Raptor
influence said to gobble up the first small animal to cross his path, but
his bot intuition told him that wouldn't be a good first impression for the
meeting.

Lunarpine understood the warriors protocall it was that way through every
war that had ever occured or will occur as the case was. "Well I've gotta
agree with the luizard on half of that." he lowered himself in the seat in a
pose that a Predacon would have found disrespectfull. "You are in command so
what are we to do when we get there?"
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, December 01, 2000 7:41 AM
Subject: (ALL MAXIMALS READ) Re: Why attack? / Maximal Meeting


> Ice::
>  She could tell that he was following the predacon protocal for
> addressing thier officers.  She frowned and spoke openly. "Razor
> Claw, please, call me Ice. I won't mind. We are more than comrads in
> arms, we are friends. I trust you with my life. I hope that one day,
> you'll trust me."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Razor Claw only had one response to Ice's intrusion. "Yes Mam." he
> called
> > with the astute of a warrior. "I'm glad you have such faith in me
> mam." He
> > was wary of using names, the Predacon ranks had punishment for
> using names
> > instead of titles. He sat back wary of Ice's powers, she could read
> his mind
> > so she knew about Predacon Protocalls.
> >
>
>
>
>
>
>
